event.title: was founded by the order of Augustinian Recollect priest in 1611

data.event: Iba was founded by the order of Augustinian Recollect priest in 1611 as the village of Paynauen.

event.title: 1860, the administration of the town was turned over

data.event: In 1860, the administration of the town was turned over to the Dominican priests until the civil government came to power.
